column1: #Text=Opal says : " We should be thinking of a way to take out Kuvira while we have the chance . "
#Text=Bolin says : " Or at least destroy the cannon .
#Text=It will take everything we have just to get out alive .
#Text=Kuvira wants every single one of her people to see the weapon test tomorrow , so the factory will be mostly empty then .
#Text=That 's our best chance to sneak in and free Su without being spotted .
#Text=I kind of have a headache now .
